deity_markdown: [Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=138), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=86), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=122), [Marishi](/Deities.aspx?ID=265), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Longstrider](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 348 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Barzahk](/Deities.aspx?ID=138), [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=86), [Jaidz](/Deities.aspx?ID=122), [Marishi](/Deities.aspx?ID=265), [The Deliberate Journey](/Deities.aspx?ID=250), [The Path of the Heavens](/Deities.aspx?ID=213)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** The duration increases to 8 hours.
name: Longstrider

summary: Increase your Speed for an hour.
summary_markdown: Increase your Speed for an hour.
text: Longstrider Source Core Rulebook pg. 348 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Barzahk, Dranngvit, Jaidz, Marishi, The Deliberate Journey, The Path of the Heavens Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 hour --- You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. --- Heightened (2nd) The duration increases to 8 hours.
